name: Le Gène du Nephamir
description:
Le Gène du Nephamir is a Visual Novel in which the player follow the story of Adam, a publisher that discover his true nature by accident.

In his world, vampires and humans built a simulacrum of peace threaten to be smashed to pieces.

But Adam is what we call a "Nephamir", the perfect mix between Human and Vampire... created by scientists trying to make real the Fountain of Youth.

---

This game was prototyped during my first year Master in Game Design, but in reflexion since 2014.
